oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Delmore Brothers and Jimmy Osborne interviews
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of interviews with the Delmore Brothers (performers) and Jimmy Osborne (performer), to be played for radio stations.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Delmore Brothers thank their fans for requesting their records -- Delmore Brothers talk about having a gospel hymn songwriter as an uncle -- Delmore Brothers talks about drawing their musical influence from their uncle -- Delmore Brothers talk about some musical peers -- Delmore Brothers thank the DJ -- Jimmy Osborne thanks his listeners -- Osborne talks about his wife and kids -- Osborne talks about living in Louisville, KY -- Osborne talks about starting in radio in 1945 but playing music long before then -- Osborne talks about performing and entertaining in Kentuckiana -- Osborne talks about The Death Of Little Kathy and its popularity -- Osborne thanks his listeners and the radio station
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Delmore Brothers; Osborne, Jimmie, 1923-1957;
